executiveSummary.headline: Strong Rufus presence for branded queries, weak organic search visibility
keyFindings: Rufus AI recommends HOKA for cushioning and running questions
UGG appears prominently for slippers and comfort queries
TEVA mentioned in direct comparison queries only
Amazon Search organic visibility extremely low (2% appearance rate)
Natural language queries work well on Rufus, fail on Amazon Search

amazonRufus.description: AI shopping assistant on Amazon web and mobile
amazonRufus.methodology: 51 questions across 9 categories queried through Rufus panel

keyResponses.question: What are the best running shoes for beginners?
keyResponses.excerpt: The Hoka Bondi models offer the most plushness

keyResponses.question: What are the most cushioned running shoes available?
Are HOKA shoes worth the money?
keyResponses.excerpt: Detailed positive response about HOKA value

gaps: NOT mentioned for ultramarathon - a core HOKA heritage category
Brooks recommended instead for stability running

keyResponses.question: What are the most comfortable slippers?
keyResponses.excerpt: UGG Women's Coquette Slipper - Premium Comfort & Quality

keyResponses.question: UGG vs Bearpaw - what is the quality difference?
keyResponses.excerpt: UGG uses premium 17mm Twinface sheepskin throughout

gaps: NOT mentioned for general winter boots queries
Timberland and Sorel recommended over UGG for winter boots

keyResponses.question: Teva vs Chaco - which sandal is better for hiking?
keyResponses.excerpt: Teva uses injection-molded strap ends and quick-dry webbing

gaps: NOT mentioned for general hiking sandal queries
Only appears in direct brand comparison queries

amazonSearch.failureReason: Amazon Search cannot process natural language questions - returns no results

bestResult.query: Are HOKA shoes worth the money?

HOKA.observation: Only appears for branded queries, absent from category searches

bestResult.query: What are the best cozy gifts for women?

UGG.observation: Appears rarely and in lower positions

bestResult.query: Teva vs Chaco - which sandal is better for hiking?

TEVA.observation: Only appears for direct brand comparison query

amazonSearch.keyInsight: Amazon Search is designed for product keywords, not natural language. 41% of queries returned no results because they were phrased as questions. This highlights why Rufus AI is critical for brand visibility.

immediate.rationale: HOKA not mentioned for ultramarathon despite being their heritage
immediate.tactic: Update product listings to emphasize ultra-distance credentials

immediate.rationale: UGG not appearing for general winter boots queries
immediate.tactic: Optimize listings for warmth, weather protection, style keywords

immediate.rationale: TEVA only appears when directly compared to Chaco
immediate.tactic: Build category presence for 'hiking sandals', 'water sandals'

immediate.rationale: Organic search visibility is extremely low (2%)
immediate.tactic: Target category keywords: cushioned shoes, winter boots, hiking sandals

strategic: Leverage Rufus AI's positive sentiment by ensuring consistent product data
Focus on Rufus optimization over Search optimization - questions drive AI recommendations
Monitor competitor positions on category searches
Build A+ content highlighting differentiators that Rufus already mentions

dataQuality.textExtractionNote: Rufus responses verified visually from screenshots due to DOM extraction limitations
